name: Dust Devil's Sunset Rodeo
simple_desc: Applies Physical Weakness to a single enemy, deals massive Physical DMG to them, and delays their action.
desc:
Applies Physical Weakness to a single target enemy, lasting for #3[i] turn(s).
Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Boothill's ATK to the target and delays their action by #2[i]%.
